products.title: Cardigan Stripe Linen Blue Horizon Roman Blind
products.description: Like waves of the sea washing in over the horizon, the cardigan stripe linen blue horizon roman blind is calming, but has a sense of energy to it too. Its the perfect balance between the two. The linen mix fabric makes the design feel even more serene, offering a soft backdr like waves of the sea washing in over the horizon, the cardigan stripe linen blue horizon roman blind is calming, but has a sense of energy to it too.

products.title: Winter Leaf Linen Gentle Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Despite a chilly name, the winter leaf linen gentle blue roman blind is anything but cold. In fact, with the linen mix fabric its incredibly cossetting. This textured backdrop gives the blind a more rustic touch, softening larger spaces and creating cosy snugs in an instant.

products.title: Choices Grande Stripe Linen Roller Blind
products.description: This beautiful natural looking roller blind is made from pure linen and has a traditional looking striped pattern that is perfect for an organic scheme. Alternating bands of soft sand and cream combine with a slubbed, rustic texture to create a look thats natural, neutral and o this beautiful natural looking roller blind is made from pure linen and has a traditional looking striped pattern that is perfect for an organic scheme.

products.title: Osborne, Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: The osborne smoke is a modern reinterpretation of a classically patterned design that takes its inspiration from the beautiful free-flowing forms of natural plant-life. A gentle grey is used to print the design onto the off-white background, giving this version of the osborne a lovely, smoky aesthetic. The smoke works beautifully as a lightener in rooms where darker features dominate, without challenging the existing colour scheme.

products.title: Riviera Stripe, Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: The riviera stripe smoke is a top quality, lightweight fabric, woven into the most contemporary of modern and eye-catching designs. Giving a full range of grey shades from charcoal, through fashionable stone greys, to a simple and pure off-white, the smoke is sure to be a great addition to your home. The colours on offer in the smoke work well as a way of adding a real depth of colour to a lightly decorated living room or front hallway.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Coated in a gently glistening satin paint, the costwold deluxe in dove grey is comprised of thick slats, a heavy duty headrail, and coordinating ladder tapes. The slats are easily adjustable to allow as much light, privacy, and ventilation as you choose. Partner the dove grey with soft whites in a nursery to produce a soothing, tranquil atmosphere perfect for a small infant. Add gentle prints featuring sweet animal characters and polka dots, including the occasional hint of subtle colour here and there.

products.title: Glencoe Ivory Roman Blind
products.description: Warmth and brightness shine through this softly neutral blind, with splashes of golden yellow peaking out through the fabric, if you look closely. That warmth is partly thanks to the gorgeously textured finish, giving it a feel and look of depth and luxury. Best of all, that neu warmth and brightness shine through this softly neutral blind, with splashes of golden yellow peaking out through the fabric, if you look closely.

products.title: Shoreham Coffee & Cream Roman Blind
products.description: This gorgeous natural linen roman blind with coffee and cream stripes has a wonderful rustic appeal with a colour scheme thats also very contemporary. The rugged texture of the fabric reminds you of the english countryside while the wide striped design is a timeless classic wit this gorgeous natural linen roman blind with coffee and cream stripes has a wonderful rustic appeal with a colour scheme thats also very contemporary.

products.title: Synergy Dove Venetian Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: For a look of elegance the synergy dove venetian blind will give you a bright and breezy space with clean lines and plenty of light. The strong aluminium slats are tough and hardwearing while the soft white wooden pelmet gives the blind a delicate and balanced finish.

products.title: Choices Shadow Leaf Linen Green Roller Blind
products.description: A luscious and verdant pattern adorns this choices shadow leaf linen green roller blind. It'll add a fresh new look to your home and breathe new life into your decor. They stylish pattern is printed onto a lovely organic linen fabric before being turned into a sophisticated rolle a luscious and verdant pattern adorns this choices shadow leaf linen green roller blind.

products.title: Choices Shadow Leaf Linen Admiral Roller Blind
products.description: Now there's not much to say about this choices shadow leaf linen admiral roller blind other than 'wow'. It's punchy and pretty, bold colour paired with a bold leaf pattern. The tonal landscape homes such luscious shades, from the deepest of indigo blues all the way through to fl now there's not much to say about this choices shadow leaf linen admiral roller blind other than 'wow'.

products.title: Choices Floral Ink Linen Pink Roller Blind
products.description: Bright, clean and pretty, this timelessly stylish blind dazzles with its use of vibrant colour and traditional beauty. Florals are back in right now, so this blinds classical trappings make it no less chic, especially with the pink and green positively bursting from the fabri bright, clean and pretty, this timelessly stylish blind dazzles with its use of vibrant colour and traditional beauty.

products.title: Choices Twill Stripe Linen Party Red Roller Blind
products.description: Add colour and sophistication to your home with this delightful twill stripe roller blind. A laminated linen fabric means it's full-bodied, textured and extremely homely. The red striped pattern brings the vibrancy and fun while the choices element means you can pick a backing, f add colour and sophistication to your home with this delightful twill stripe roller blind.

products.title: Ivory Perfect Fit
products.description: This ivory perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Perforated Cream Filtra Perfect Fit
products.description: This perforated cream perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Cream Perfect Fit
products.description: This cream perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Double Cream Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Rigid aluminium slats are beautifully showcased in double cream gloss, a soft and sumptuous hue with a high-beam shine. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors.

products.title: Elodie Dove Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Charming and practical, their elodie dove grey roman blind really does have it all. The beautiful blind is soft in texture and has a lovely warm neutral colouring, making it a wonderfully versatile blind. The dove grey is a perfect shade for those wanting to add that some charming and practical, their elodie dove grey roman blind really does have it all.

products.title: Paleo Linen Rustic Blue  Roman Blind
products.description: Deep, dark and classy, this paleo linen rustic blue roman blind will lend an air of effortless sophistication to your space. The perfect shade for adding a little depth to a bright, modern space, or for maximising the relaxing appeal of a more rustic space, this stately blind i deep, dark and classy, this paleo linen rustic blue roman blind will lend an air of effortless sophistication to your space.

products.title: Paleo Linen Ruby Red  Roman Blind
products.description: Stately, refined and with a look as sophisticated as its gemstone namesake, the paleo linen ruby red roman blind is an instant injection of luxury for your decor. The perfect shade to team with deep, dark shades of grey or even black, its ideal for a contemporary space. Cosy t stately, refined and with a look as sophisticated as its gemstone namesake, the paleo linen ruby red roman blind is an instant injection of luxury for your decor.

products.title: Paleo Linen Vapour Grey  Roman Blind
products.description: The deep and earthy shade of this paleo linen vapour grey roman blind brings to mind pebble beaches or natural, rain-washed stone. Its this organic tone that sets this blind apart from its grey counterparts, making it warm and cosy as well as stylish. Combine with bright walls the deep and earthy shade of this paleo linen vapour grey roman blind brings to mind pebble beaches or natural, rain-washed stone.

products.title: Paleo Linen Mustard  Roman Blind
products.description: If you were looking for a vibrant, on-trend way to cover your windows then this paleo linen mustard roman blind is where your search ends. The golden hue and richly textured fabric is warm and cosy, yes, but bright and joyful as a summers afternoon. Its the perfect complement if you were looking for a vibrant, on-trend way to cover your windows then this paleo linen mustard roman blind is where your search ends.

products.title: Paleo Linen Golden Apple  Roman Blind
products.description: Simply delicious, this paleo linen golden apple roman blind radiates fresh, natural appeal. The bright green shade is great for adding as a singular splash of colour as its muted and neutral, but for a more vibrant scheme it can be complemented perfectly with touches of deep simply delicious, this paleo linen golden apple roman blind radiates fresh, natural appeal.

products.title: Paleo Linen Homespun Grey  Roman Blind
products.description: Add a note of rustic charm to a modern space with this paleo linen homespun grey roman blind. The richness of the weave and depth of texture makes this otherwise crisply modern fabric super cosy, swaddling your space in warmth and comfort. On top of that, theres a range of add a note of rustic charm to a modern space with this paleo linen homespun grey roman blind.

products.title: Paleo Linen Sandstone  Roman Blind
products.description: The pale sandy colour of a sun-drenched beach, this simple and beautiful paleo linen sandstone roman blind is a study in straightforward chic. The rich tone radiates a kind of uplifting brightness, the perfect light touch for a space dominated by dark furniture or floors, thoug the pale sandy colour of a sun-drenched beach, this simple and beautiful paleo linen sandstone roman blind is a study in straightforward chic.

products.title: Paleo Linen Teal Wash  Roman Blind
products.description: Easily mistaken for a crisp and contemporary grey, this paleo linen teal wash roman blind is simply stunning. The cool hint of colour enhances the fabric and makes it that much more eye-catching, but the vibe it exudes is still a subtle one. Equally suitable for more rustic or easily mistaken for a crisp and contemporary grey, this paleo linen teal wash roman blind is simply stunning.
